org.waarp.ftp.client

Class WaarpFtp4jClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.ftp.client.WaarpFtp4jClient

  • public class WaarpFtp4jClient
extends Object
    FTP client using FTP4J model (working in all modes)

        Ask to transfer a file
        Parameters:
